text:
Hi all,

I’m encountering an issue while trying to add a UI extension (card) to my existing public app.

Previously, I hadn’t used a `public-app.json` file (I set up auth and webhooks via the UI). However, it seems that the file is necessary for defining extensions. I’ve since created a `public-app.json` file, but when trying to upload it, HubSpot attempts to create a new app instead of updating the existing one. In my `public-app.json`, I’m using my App ID as the `uid`.

Is this approach correct? Or is there something I’m missing?

You’ll want to use the `hs project migrate-app` command in order to migrate an app created in the UI to projects. Here are the docs on it: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/guides/crm/public-apps/migrate-a-public-app-to-projects|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/guides/crm/public-apps/migrate-a-public-app-to-projects>

Hi all,

Is it possible to set a tooltip/title for a button to give more detailed info about the function of it?
